health.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver
health.author: Mahatma Gandhi

health.quote: He who has health has hope; and he who has hope has everything
health.author: Arabian proverb

health.quote: It is exercise alone that supports the spirits, and keeps the mind in vigor
health.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

health.quote: Keep your vitality. A life without health is like a river without water
health.author: Maxime Lagacé

health.quote: Three things in life – your health, your mission, and the people you love. That’s it
health.author: Naval Ravikant

health.quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought – they must be earned
health.author: Naval Ravikant

health.quote: True silence is the rest of the mind, and is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment
health.author: William Penn

health.quote: Happiness is the highest form of health
health.author: Dalai Lama

health.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul
health.author: Tony Robbins

health.quote: A good laugh and a long sleep are the best cures in the doctor’s book
health.author: Irish proverb

health.quote: Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health
health.author: Carl Jung

health.quote: The more you understand yourself, the more silence there is, the healthier you are
health.author: Maxime Lagacé

health.quote: The greatest of follies is to sacrifice health for any other kind of happiness
health.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

health.quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health
health.author: Henry David Thoreau

health.quote: Doctors won’t make you healthy. Nutritionists won’t make you slim. Teachers won’t make you smart. Gurus won’t make you calm. Mentors won’t make you rich. Trainers won’t make you fit. Ultimately, you have to take responsibility. Save yourself
health.author: Naval Ravikant

health.quote: The greatest wealth is health
health.author: Virgil

health.quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food
health.author: Hippocrates

health.quote: Health is a vehicle, not a destination
health.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

health.quote: When the heart is at ease, the body is healthy
health.author: Chinese proverb

health.quote: In a disordered mind, as in a disordered body, soundness of health is impossible
health.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

health.quote: Your health is what you make of it. Everything you do and think either adds to the vitality, energy and spirit you possess or takes away from it
health.author: Ann Wigmore

health.quote: Good health and good sense are two of life’s greatest blessings
health.author: Publilius Syrus

health.quote: Give a man health and a course to steer, and he’ll never stop to trouble about whether he’s happy or not
health.author: George Bernard Shaw

health.quote: The scientific truth may be put quite briefly; eat moderately, having an ordinary mixed diet, and don’t worry
health.author: Robert Hutchison

health.quote: Before healing others, heal yourself
health.author: Gambian saying

health.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you
health.author: Joyce Meyer

health.quote: Moderation. Small helpings. Sample a little bit of everything. These are the secrets of happiness and good health
health.author: Julia Child

health.quote: Nobody can be in good health if he does not have all the time fresh air, sunshine and good water
health.author: Flying Hawk (Native American saying)

health.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly
health.author: Buddhist saying

health.quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory
health.author: Albert Schweitzer

health.quote: Keeping your body healthy is an expression of gratitude to the whole cosmos – the trees, the clouds, everything
health.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

health.quote: Life is like a tree and its root is consciousness. Therefore, once we tend the root, the tree as a whole will be healthy
health.author: Deepak Chopra

health.quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost
health.author: Charles Caleb Colton

health.quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison
health.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

health.quote: Sickness – nature’s vengeance for violating her laws
health.author: Charles Simmons

health.quote: After dinner rest a while; after supper walk a mile.
health.author: T Cogan

health.quote: In order to change we must be sick and tired of being sick and tired
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health
health.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

health.quote: Your body hears everything your mind says
health.author: Naomi Judd

health.quote: Health consists with temperance alone
health.author: Alexander Pope

health.quote: Health is a relationship between you and your body
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Health is a large word. It embraces not the body only, but the mind and spirit as well; …and not today’s pain or pleasure alone, but the whole being and outlook of a man. James H
health.author: West

health.quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of year. Franklin P
health.author: Adams

health.quote: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise
health.author: Benjamin Franklin

health.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship
health.author: Buddha

health.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
health.author: John F Kennedy

health.quote: I have chosen to be happy because it is good for my health
health.author: Voltaire

health.quote: When a man is ill his very goodness is sickly
health.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

health.quote: An apple a day keeps the doctor away
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Health is the first muse, comprising the magical benefits of air, landscape, and bodily exercise on the mind
health.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

health.quote: I stand in awe of my body
health.author: Henry David Thoreau

health.quote: There is one consolation in being sick; and that is the possibility that you may recover to a better state than you were ever in before
health.author: Henry David Thoreau

health.quote: Our bodies are our gardens – our wills are our gardeners
health.author: William Shakespeare

health.quote: Eat to live, not live to eat
health.author: Socrates

health.quote: Prevention is better than cure
health.author: Desiderius Erasmus

health.quote: The biggest disease today is not leprosy or tuberculosis, but rather the feeling of being unwanted
health.author: Mother Teresa

health.quote: I am confident that nobody will accuse me of selfishness if I ask to spend time, while I am still in good health, with my family, my friends and also with myself
health.author: Nelson Mandela

health.quote: Money doesn’t mean anything to me. I’ve made a lot of money, but I want to enjoy life and not stress myself building my bank account. I give lots away and live simply, mostly out of a suitcase in hotels. We all know that good health is much more important
health.author: Keanu Reeves

health.quote: Love is not as important as good health. You cannot be in love if you’re not healthy. You can’t appreciate it
health.author: Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad)

health.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don’t want, drink what you don’t like, and do what you’d rather not
health.author: Mark Twain

health.quote: It is well to be up before daybreak, for such habits contribute to health, wealth, and wisdom
health.author: Aristotle

health.quote: The really important thing is not to live, but to live well… and to live well means the same thing as to live honourably or rightly
health.author: Socrates

health.quote: The best doctors gives the least medicine
health.author: Benjamin Franklin

health.quote: Nothing is more fatal to health, than an over care of it
health.author: Benjamin Franklin

health.quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far
health.author: Thomas Jefferson

health.quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits
health.author: Thomas Jefferson

health.quote: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning
health.author: Thomas Jefferson

health.quote: The doctor of the future will give no medicines, but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the causes and prevention of disease
health.author: Thomas Edison

health.quote: Healthy citizens are the greatest asset any country can have
health.author: Winston Churchill

health.quote: Water, air, and cleanness are the chief articles in my pharmacy
health.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

health.quote: Health is not valued until sickness comes
health.author: Thomas Fuller

health.quote: If you would live long, open your heart
health.author: Bulgarian saying

health.quote: The first wealth is health
health.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

health.quote: Fresh air impoverishes the doctor
health.author: Danish proverb

health.quote: Health and intellect are the two blessings of life
health.author: Menander

health.quote: Eating is overrated and sleep is underrated
health.author: @AmuseChimp

health.quote: Well-being is enough wealth
health.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

health.quote: Garbage in garbage out
health.author: George Fuechsel

health.quote: Inhale. Exhale
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Having a healthy mind is just as important as a healty body
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Eat right, exercise regularly, die anyway
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: If you think wellness is expensive, try illness
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Your health is an investment, not an expense
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: A man grows most tired while standing still
health.author: Chinese proverb

health.quote: There are some remedies worse than the disease
health.author: Publilius Syrus

health.quote: Health and cheerfulness are brothers
health.author: William Hardcastle Browne

health.quote: Great health starts with a great sleep
health.author: Dan Go

health.quote: When the head aches, all the body is the worse
health.author: English proverb

health.quote: He who can believe himself well, will be well
health.author: Ovid

health.quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body
health.author: Joseph Addison

health.quote: Most people have no idea how good their body is designed to feel
health.author: Kevin Trudeau

health.quote: Know, then, whatever cheerful and serene supports the mind supports the body too
health.author: John Armstrong

health.quote: Your body holds deep wisdom. Trust in it. Learn from it. Nourish it. Watch your life transform and be healthy
health.author: Bella Bleue

health.quote: Embrace and love your body. It’s the most amazing thing you will ever own
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: The higher your energy level, the more efficient your body. The more efficient your body, the better you feel and the more you will use your talent to produce outstanding results
health.author: Tony Robbins

health.quote: Use your health, even to the point of wearing it out. That is what it is for. Spend all you have before you die; do not outlive yourself
health.author: George Bernard Shaw

health.quote: Most of us would be upset if we were accused of being ‘silly.’ But the word ‘silly’ comes from the old English word ‘selig’ and its literal definition is ‘to be blessed, happy, healthy and prosperous’
health.author: Zig Ziglar

health.quote: Never continue in a job you don’t enjoy. If you’re happy in what you’re doing, you’ll like yourself, you’ll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined
health.author: Johnny Carson

health.quote: The chief condition on which life, health, and vigor depend on, is action. It is by action that an organism develops its faculties, increases its energy, and attains the fulfillment of its destiny
health.author: Colin Powell

health.quote: Let your body be your holy temple
health.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

health.quote: If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health
health.author: Hippocrates

health.quote: If we are creating ourselves all the time, then it is never too late to begin creating the bodies we want instead of the ones we mistakenly assume we are stuck with
health.author: Deepak Chopra

health.quote: Look up, laugh loud, talk big, keep the color in your cheek and the fire in your eye, adorn your person, maintain your health, your beauty and your animal spirits
health.author: William Hazlitt

health.quote: Knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people
health.author: Fred Rogers

health.quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you
health.author: Deepak Chopra

health.quote: Rule No.37. The whiter the bread, the sooner you’ll be dead
health.author: Michael Pollan

health.quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint
health.author: Mark Twain

health.quote: You’re in pretty good shape for the shape you are in. Dr
health.author: Seuss

health.quote: The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you’re off it
health.author: Jackie Gleason

health.quote: I know a man who gave up smoking, drinking, sex, and rich food. He was healthy right up to the day he killed himself
health.author: Johnny Carson

health.quote: Exercise is a dirty word. Every time I hear it, I wash my mouth out with chocolate.
health.author: Charles M Schulz

health.quote: I drive way too fast to worry about cholesterol
health.author: Steven Wright

health.quote: After these two, Dr. Diet and Dr. Quiet, Dr. Merriman is requisite to preserve health
health.author: James Howell

health.quote: Health of body and mind is a great blessing, if we can bear it
health.author: John Henry Cardinal Newman

health.quote: A man’s health can be judged by which he takes two at a time – pills or stairs
health.author: Joan Welsh

health.quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account
health.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

health.quote: If I’d known I was going to live this long, I’d have taken better care of myself
health.author: Eubie Blake

health.quote: Joy and temperance and repose, slam the door on the doctor’s nose
health.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

health.quote: Anybody’s soap is superior to somebody else’s stink killer.
health.author: Martin H Fischer

health.quote: Health is merely the slowest way someone can die
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Many people treat their bodies as if they were rented from Hertz – something they are using to get around in but nothing they genuinely care about understanding
health.author: Chungliang Al Huang

health.quote: To be stupid and selfish and to have good health are the three requirements for happiness. Though if stupidity is lacking, the others are useless
health.author: Stefan Sagmeister

health.quote: If you do everything you should do, and do not do anything you should not do, you will, according to the best available statistics, live exactly eighteen hours longer than you would otherwise
health.author: Logan Clendening

health.quote: First need in the reform of hospital management? That’s easy! The death of all dietitians, and the resurrection of a French chef.
health.author: Martin H Fischer

health.quote: Doctors are always working to preserve our health and cooks to destroy it, but the latter are the more often successful
health.author: Denis Diderot

health.quote: There’s lots of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven’t the time to enjoy it
health.author: Josh Billings

health.quote: A bad cold wouldn’t be so annoying if it weren’t for the advice of our friends
health.author: Kin Hubbard

health.quote: I reckon being ill as one of the great pleasures of life, provided one is not too ill and is not obliged to work till one is better
health.author: Samuel Butler

health.quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon
health.author: Doug Larson

health.quote: Money cannot buy health, but I’d settle for a diamond-studded wheelchair
health.author: Dorothy Parker

health.quote: I think you might dispense with half your doctors if you would only consult Dr. Sun more
health.author: Henry Ward Beecher

health.quote: A sad soul can kill you quicker than a germ
health.author: John Steinbeck

health.quote: The part can never be well unless the whole is well
health.author: Plato

health.quote: Objection, evasion, joyous distrust, and love of irony are signs of health; everything absolute belongs to pathology
health.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

health.quote: There is something in sickness that breaks down the pride of manhood
health.author: Charles Dickens

health.quote: How sickness enlarges the dimension of a man’s self to himself!
health.author: Charles Lamb

health.quote: Happiness lies, first of all, in health
health.author: George William Curtis

health.quote: If man thinks about his physical or moral state he usually discovers that he is ill
health.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

health.quote: The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
health.author: G.K Chesterton

health.quote: Promise a great and total change — from poor to rich, sickness to health, misery to ecstasy — and you will have followers
health.author: Robert Greene

health.quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society
health.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

health.quote: The root of all health is in the brain. The trunk of it is in emotion. The branches and leaves are the body. The flower of health blooms when all parts work together
health.author: Kurdish Saying

health.quote: A healthy body is a guest chamber for the soul: a sick body is a prison
health.author: Francis Bacon Sr

health.quote: Sickness always brings the soul nearer to God
health.author: James Lendall Basford

health.quote: People who are always taking care of their health are like misers who are hoarding a treasure which they have never spirit enough to enjoy
health.author: Laurence Sterne

health.quote: If you have health, you probably will be happy, and if you have health and happiness, you have all the wealth you need, even if it is not all you want
health.author: Elbert Hubbard

health.quote: A sound mind in a sound body, is a short, but full description of a happy state in this world: he that has these two, has little more to wish for; and he that wants either of them, will be little the better for anything else
health.author: John Locke

health.quote: We are healthy only to the extent that our ideas are humane
health.author: Kurt Vonnegut

health.quote: Diseases of the soul are more dangerous and more numerous than those of the body
health.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

health.quote: Illness tells us what we are
health.author: Italian saying

health.quote: To avoid sickness eat less; to prolong life worry less
health.author: Chu Hui Weng

health.quote: From the bitterness of disease man learns the sweetness of health
health.author: Catalan proverb

health.quote: The appearance of a disease is swift as an arrow; its disappearance slow, like a thread
health.author: Chinese proverb

health.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear
health.author: Buddha

health.quote: Love, success, family and friends all come after my health. No health, no enjoyment
health.author: Maxime Lagacé

health.quote: If you are going to heal in a magnificent way, you have to feel magnificent
health.author: Joe Dispenza

health.quote: So many people spend their health gaining wealth, and then have to spend their wealth to regain their health. A.J
health.author: Reb Materi

health.quote: In minds crammed with thoughts, organs clogged with toxins, and bodies stiffened with neglect, there is just no space for anything else
health.author: Alison Rose Levy

health.quote: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost; when health is lost, something is lost; when character is lost, all is lost
health.author: Billy Graham

health.quote: If by gaining knowledge we destroy our health, we labour for a thing that will be useless in our hands
health.author: John Locke

health.quote: Look to your health; and if you have it, praise God, and value it next to a good conscience; for health is the second blessing that we mortals are capable of; a blessing that money cannot buy
health.author: Izaak Walton

health.quote: The patient should be made to understand that he or she must take charge of his own life. Don’t take your body to the doctor as if he were a repair shop
health.author: Quentin Regestein

health.quote: Criticism may not be agreeable, but it is necessary. It fulfills the same function as pain in the human body. It calls attention to an unhealthy state of things
health.author: Winston Churchill

health.quote: Poor health is not caused by something you don’t have; it’s caused by disturbing something that you already have. Healthy is not something that you need to get, it’s something you have already if you don’t disturb it
health.author: Dean Ornish

health.quote: No time for your health today, no health for your time tomorrow
health.author: Thibaut

health.quote: My number one priority in life, above my happiness, above my family, above my work, is my own health. It starts with my physical health
health.author: Naval Ravikant

health.quote: I have looked through the list of illnesses, and did not find cares or sad thoughts mentioned among them. That is a mistake, surely
health.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

health.quote: When health is absent, wisdom cannot reveal itself, art cannot manifest, strength cannot fight, wealth becomes useless, and intelligence cannot be applied
health.author: Herophilus

health.quote: Physical ills are the taxes laid upon this wretched life; some are taxed higher, and some lower, but all pay something
health.author: Lord Chesterfield

health.quote: What man is happy? He who has a healthy body, a resourceful mind, and a docile nature
health.author: Thales Of Miletus

health.quote: There is no one giant step that does it. It’s a lot of little steps
health.author: Unknown

health.quote: Those who think they have no time for healthy eating… will sooner or later have to find time for illness
health.author: Edward Stanley

health.quote: We drink to one another’s health and spoil our own.
health.author: Jerome K. Jerome

health.quote: Don’t defy the diagnosis, try to defy the verdict
health.author: Norman Cousins

health.quote: Disease is somatic; the suffering from it, psychic.
health.author: Martin H. Fischer

health.quote: Your prayer must be for a sound mind in a sound body
health.author: Juvenal

health.quote: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live
health.author: Jim Rohn
